blog.name: plusultra-writing
blog.title: Plus Ultra!
blog.description: This blog is dedicated for headcanons and scenarios of various heroes and pro-heroes. This is a sfw blog because I think my nsfw content is laughable at best, but you can ask nicely and i juuust might try at the cost of my dignity. Requests are open. Ran by Gyro

summary: If you aren’t too busy could you do headcanons for a sick Shoji being taken care of by his s/o please! Again if your busy then...
question: If you aren’t too busy could you do headcanons for a sick Shoji being taken care of by his s/o please! Again if your busy then please don’t sorry about it! I really like your writing!
answer:
I’m not too busy (as of now)! All this stuff about graduating has been draining my motivation so having this new request might give me that breath of fresh air!

- Chrono

Shoji Mezo

  • Shoji seldom fell ill, and never enjoyed the off chance when he did.
  • With you there, it was a little more bearable, but he felt awful leaving you with all the work while he recovered.
  • He’d want to help you out as much as possible, whether it’s retrieving his own medicine or the like.
  • And you’d repeatedly have to tell him that he needs to relax, working would only make him more sick and tired, which would more or less hinder than help, much to his chagrin.
  • You also promised him you’d keep an eye on the rest of class 1-A while he was out of commission, knowing how concerned he was for his classmates’ safety.
  • All of your free time was spent taking care of him and spending time with him while he was bedridden, which you of course didn’t mind at all. Any opportunity to be with him was something you wouldn’t pass up for the world.
  • Unfortunately, this got you sick in turn later, but Shoji was sure to take extensive care of you, as you did for him.

- Chrono

title: Don’t say goodbye yet
description:
by Idontevenlikecabbage

The year is 1773, February first and Bakugo is enrolled in a school for law that’s owned by his uncle, All Might. He’s pissed and mad, not to mention overwhelmed and just wants to go home, until he meets a man by the name of Kirishima Eijiro.

Words: 1984, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: F/F, F/M, M/M
  • Characters: Kirishima Eijirou, Bakugou Katsuki, Midoriya Izuku, Ashido Mina, Uraraka Ochako, Yagi Toshinori | All Might, Aizawa Shouta | Eraserhead, Todoroki Shouto, Kaminari Denki, Sero Hanta, Yaoyorozu Momo, Jirou Kyouka, pretty much everyone in 1a and a few in 1b
  • Relationships: Bakugou Katsuki/Kirishima Eijirou, i’ll add more as i go - Relationship
  • Additional Tags: kiribaku, this is around the civil war, history time, take a trip back with ms frizzle, Angst, Fluff, Smut, idk how long it’s gonna be yet

title: Mine

by FireElfdancer42

Bakugo is just trying to enjoy his night off. It’s not his fault that everybody at this God forsaken bar is hitting on him?

title: Wildflowers
description:
by SevenRenny

They were hardworking people, her Mom and Dad. And she was grateful for that. Their small community in the woods allowed for accesses to water, food, and shelter. She was faring better than others. She was grateful for that. The call to unite with her One and Only had her torn in two. Her tribe, or her happiness? IzuOcha

Note: Rating for violence and dark themes.

Words: 18518, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

blog.name: iamasquareandyoucantchangethat
blog.description: i don't post a lot here, but my main blog is @c-mell-34

summary:
This is my new bnha oc
His name is Shojiki Uwaki
He's second year in the support department, and he's the biggest flirt ever,...
body:
This is my new bnha oc

His name is Shojiki Uwaki

He’s second year in the support department, and he’s the biggest flirt ever, he’ll flirt with everyone, EVERYONE!! from the smallest thing such as complimenting your eyes to, uh? What is the highest level of flirting? I don’t know, I don’t flirt. Probably.

He can read other people’s minds by simulating the chemicals that generate their thoughts, do I make sense? Because our bodies do almost everything by chemicals right? The downside is if he uses his quirk for too long he’ll start simulating the other parties actions, which can be pretty problematic and embarrassing at times.

He loves art, math and science, things that he needs to create and improve weapons. He hates history, geography and things that HE considers useless, and he is very bad in sports, he’s too slow, he can’t through a ball, he is hopeless.
